## Events.VarCreate.run() method

Run a variable creation event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
run(forward: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  forward | boolean | True if run forward, false if run backward (undo). |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
